ygData.subject: Re: Items poliferation is a sword of damakle over Casters!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Right what i wished to say TWINKED WITH THE BEST OF ITEMS if you read carefuly me post it was what i wished to say i again excuse as my english is not
ygData.messageBody:
At 16.56 10/09/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Sergey Bukhman <sergeyb@...>
>
>
>
>Wizard wrote:
>>
>> From: Wizard <wizard@...>
>>
>> Same effect i have seen in mistmore .. grouping with many people i have
>> seen what diference can make overpowered items... warrior hitting for 70 a
>> hit it is 140 - 160 counting a bash ... without mana use a turn!!
>>
>
>Warriors hitting for 70 when they are in their mid twenties is extremely
>rare. They might sometime get a critical hit that high. Or, maybe, if
>they are twinked with the best of items, I might believe it. Otherwise,
>I think you probably saw something rare and consider it a regularity.

Right what i wished to say "TWINKED WITH THE BEST OF ITEMS" if you read
carefuly me post it was what i wished to say i again excuse as my english
is not yet maxed so what i wish to say and what i realy write can sometimes
require 2 reads to get into :).

The problem on wich i wished to point is that strongest items on older
servers like fenin ro where i play start to become common and lost much of
price in time as evryone can heve them from a higer lv friend or somone
sell powerful item as he have found somthing better ect.... It is rare but
nothing strange to see a warrior under 20 in full crafted or rubicite with
powerfull weapon. Or druid with Pawn weapon and fear armour on 28!



>You know, sometimes root holds all the battle and let's you med and fire
>some more. Rarely, but sometimes. A warrior seeing this would go and
>complain about the overpowered wizards. You have to take things with a
>perspective.
>
>--
>Sergey
